about_the_game:
Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, this pack having the original 2 factory prototypes, cars in the original paintscheme, "Sputnik", "Sandgelb" and more modern others also. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with disk brakes, have a top speed of 120km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Romania, Czech Republic and Poland.

Pack includes:

*10 doubledecker cars with high-quality textures

*Full PBR textures

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*3 levels of buffer contact sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

*Disable Physics option

*Custom bogeysounds

*Custom realistic full interior(lower deck, middle and upper deck)

*Interior & exterior nightmode

*Editable destination boards with text fields for departure station, destination station, via station
detailed_description:
Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, this pack having the original 2 factory prototypes, cars in the original paintscheme, "Sputnik", "Sandgelb" and more modern others also. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with disk brakes, have a top speed of 120km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Romania, Czech Republic and Poland.

Pack includes:

*10 doubledecker cars with high-quality textures

*Full PBR textures

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*3 levels of buffer contact sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

*Disable Physics option

*Custom bogeysounds

*Custom realistic full interior(lower deck, middle and upper deck)

*Interior & exterior nightmode

*Editable destination boards with text fields for departure station, destination station, via station

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
